AI Description: R-scrnaseq is an R package designed for preprocessing and analyzing single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data. It offers a comprehensive suite of tools for quality control, normalization, dimensionality reduction, clustering, differential expression analysis, and visualization of scRNA-seq data.
Core Features: Quality Control Of Scrna-Seq Data, Normalization & Pre-Processing Of Single-Cell Gene Expression Data, Dimensionality Reduction Techniques Such As Pca & T-Sne, Cluster Analysis To Identify Cell Populations, Differential Expression Analysis To Identify Marker Genes, Visualization Tools For Expression Patterns & Cluster Assignments
General Tags: Single-Cell RNA Sequencing, Bioinformatics, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, R Package
